articles.content: Prince Harry - who had an on-and-off relationship with Burberry muse and model Cressida Bonas from 2012 to 2014 - flew into rage when a fan asked the royal for a photograph with his then girlfriend.… [+1771 chars]

articles.title: John Bird: Actor and comedian dies aged 86 - BBC
articles.description: The Bafta-winning actor was best known for political satire, including Bremner, Bird and Fortune.
articles.content:
Actor and comedian John Bird has died aged 86, his representatives have confirmed.
Bird was part of the TV satire boom of the 1960s, and well known for his many appearances opposite John Fortune.
